name: subcan2i
params: class c0, class c1, class c2
body: |- wb(wceq(co(c0, cmin, c1), co(c2, cmin, c1)), wceq(c0, c2))

stmt.origin: mp3an(wb(wceq(co(c0, cmin, c1), co(c2, cmin, c1)), wceq(c0, c2)), wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c2, cc), wcel(c1, cc))

body.origin:
|- wb(wceq(co(c0, cmin, c1), co(c2, cmin, c1)), wceq(c0, c2))
-| wcel(c0, cc)
-| wcel(c2, cc)
-| wcel(c1, cc)
-| wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c2, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wb(wceq(co(c0, cmin, c1), co(c2, cmin, c1)), wceq(c0, c2)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wceq(co(c0, cmin, c1), co(c2, cmin, c1)), wceq(c0, c2))
-| wcel(c0, cc)
-| wcel(c2, cc)
-| wcel(c1, cc)
-| wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c2, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wb(wceq(co(c0, cmin, c1), co(c2, cmin, c1)), wceq(c0, c2)))

body.origin: |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c2, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wb(wceq(co(c0, cmin, c1), co(c2, cmin, c1)), wceq(c0, c2)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wceq(co(c0, cmin, c1), co(c2, cmin, c1)), wceq(c0, c2))
-| wcel(c0, cc)
-| wcel(c2, cc)

comment: Cancellation law for subtraction. (Contributed by NM, 8-Feb-2005.)
